title: Muṣaṣir
description: A town mentioned in Neo-Assyrian sources. Although the city's exact location is not known, it has tentatively been identified with modern Mergasur, which is 10 km west of Topzawa.

properties.description: The modern location of Mergasur, based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap, has been associated with the ancient site.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Mergasur
